summary.para: The TF_HALTCOND structure is used to contain conditions of a range shift.
Pointer to an object that halts the shift. If the range shift encounters this range during the shift, the shift halts. This member can be NULL.
Contains one of the values that specifies which anchor of pHaltRange the anchor will get shifted to if pHaltRange is encountered during the range shift. This member is ignored if pHaltRange is NULL.
Contains a set of flags that modify the behavior of the range shift. This can be zero or the following value.

item.description: The range shift halts if an embedded object is encountered.
